snippet.title: Amber Heard The Next "Red Sonja"?
snippet.description:
http://Twitter.com/ClevverMovies - Follow Us!

Could Red Sonja be getting the Amber heard Treatment?  The actress could be getting the gig- those details up next!

Hey Fellow Movie fans, I'm Chelsea Cannell coming to you from our Clevver Movies Headquarters here in Hollywood. 

A remake of Red Sonja is on the books but an actress to star as the comic book hottie has yet to be selected.

Word is Amber heard is being eyed as the fav to play the iconic character. .
Producer Avi Lerner recently told the media, that they are talking to a few girls for the role but since they just finished the film "Drive Angry" with Amber -- they are definitely taking a hard look at the blonde beauty.

Lerner also revealed, currently Amber is his favorite for the role... and proving this is more than JUST a rumor... he also added "Amber is the new Red Sonja, She just doesn't know it yet!"

In the past Rose McGowan was rumored to be getting the role back when Robert Rodriquez was producing and Douglas Aarniokoski was directing. 

Now Lerner is supposedly in talks with director Simon West, who was the helmer behind "The Mechanic."

Lerner also added that the film is currently slated to shoot between Conan and it's sequel Conan 2.

The development process definitely seems to be heating up- so we'd love to hear how you think it's shaping up -- Is Amber heard your pick for Red Sonja? Or was Rose McGowan a better fit? And how about Simon West as the director? Make sure to fill us in.

And don't forget to follow us on twitter @clevvermovies or me @chelseacannell to make sure you stay up to date on all the latest Hollywood happenings.

Thanks for watching, see y'all next time!
